Henry Lee

A great place for a summer beer idyll in Williamsburg. Red tin ceiling looks down on campy ephemera. Every piece of kitsch for sale. Knowledgeable and unpretentious barkeeps guide you Belgium, and dispense meticulously prepped charcuterthrough bewildering but excellent list of beers from around the world, especially Belgium, and dispense meticulously prepped charcuteries. We love sitting in the wilderness garden out back and playing this game: "Okay, I'm gonna order a Spkyttr Bsnchausen...think they got that?"

Comments

  • Headline 1

    A great place for a summer beer idyll in Williamsburg. Red tin ceiling looks down on campy ephemera. Every piece of kitsch for sale. Knowledgeable and unpretentious barkeeps guide you through bewildering but excellent list of beers from around the world, especially Belgium, and dispense meticulously prepped charcuteries. We love sitting in the wilderness garden out back and playing this game: "Okay, I'm gonna order a Spkyttr Bsnchausen...think they got that?"

  • Headline 2

    A great place for a summer beer idyll in Williamsburg. Red tin ceiling looks down on campy ephemera. Every piece of kitsch for sale. Knowledgeable and unpretentious barkeeps guide you through bewildering but excellent list of beers from around the world, especially Belgium, and dispense meticulously prepped charcuteries. We love sitting in the wilderness garden out back and playing this game: "Okay, I'm gonna order a Spkyttr Bsnchausen...think they got that?"
